powerbox_spawn_maxim_description: Cute little pumpkin with a nice smile
powerbox_spawn_mastef_description: What makes a man, Mr. Lebowski?
powerbox_spawn_burger_spider_description: Comes at nights and steals the kids. Loves to eat
powerbox_add_items_description: Select items and then add it from creatures
powerbox_remove_items_description: Select items and then remove it from creatures
powerbox_non_random_friendship_descripti: Force kingdom to make peace with someone
powerbox_upgrade_building_description: Upgrade buildings level right now without any cost to villagers
powerbox_downgrade_building_description: Downgrade buildings level right now without any pay to villagers
powerbox_expand_city_borders_description: Drag city's border and move it to expand
powerbox_create_colony_description: Use it on civilized villagers, which outside of their city and on free land, to make new colony
powerbox_spawn_boat_fishing_description: Spawn fishing boat. Spawns only on water, and only in kingdom's borders
powerbox_spawn_boat_transport_descriptio: Spawn transport boat. Spawns only on water, and only in kingdom's borders
powerbox_spawn_boat_trading_description: Spawn trading boat. Spawns only on water, and only in kingdom's borders
powerbox_spawn_burger_spider_cloud_descr: Cloudy with a chance of burger spiders
powerbox_cant_use_items_error: The items of this unit cannot be changed.
powerbox_find_culture_members_descriptio: Find Members of the selected Culture
powerbox_expand_culture_borders_descript: Drag the borders of a culture and move them to expand
powerbox_reduce_culture_borders_descript: Click culture borders to remove them
powerbox_create_new_culture_description: Click a city where you want to create a new culture, and the entire city will be overtaken by that new culture
powerbox_find_favorite_items_description: WARNING: items aren't saved between sessions
powerbox_item_favorited_message: This item has been marked as favorite! Note that this information is not saved between sessions.
powerbox_item_unfavorited_message: This item has been removed from favorites!
powerbox_item_not_found_message: The selected item could not be found anywhere in this world! It will be removed from the favorites list.
powerbox_create_alliance_description: Create an alliance between two kingdoms
powerbox_create_alliance_same_kingdom_se: Selected the same kingdom twice, try again.
powerbox_create_alliance_already_allied_: The selected kingdoms are already allied, try again.
powerbox_create_alliance_success: The kingdoms have successfully entered an alliance.
powerbox_duplicate_culture_description: Click a city where you want to create a duplicate culture, and the entire city will be overtaken by a duplicate of its previous culture with all tech carried over
powerbox_assign_king_description: Make a specific unit the king of its kingdom
powerbox_assign_leader_description: Make a specific unit the leader of its city
powerbox_assign_capital_description: Make a specific city the capital of its kingdom
powerbox_create_clan_description: Create a new clan with the selected unit as the leader
powerbox_convert_city_description: Convert a city to a different kingdom
powerbox_convert_city_select_kingdom: Select a kingdom to convert the city to.
powerbox_convert_city_no_city_selected_e: No city on the selected tile, try again.
powerbox_convert_city_no_kingdom_selecte: No kingdom on the selected tile, try again.
powerbox_convert_city_same_kingdom_error: The city is already part of the selected kingdom, try again.
powerbox_convert_city_different_races_er: You can't transfer a city to a kingdom of a different race, try again.
powerbox_find_all_creatures_description: Find all creatures in your world
powerbox_edit_culture_tech_button_descri: Edit the tech of a culture
powerbox_edit_resources_no_storage_error: No storage found in the selected city, try waiting until one is built.
powerbox_create_new_religion_description: Click a city where you want to create a new religion, and the entire city will be overtaken by that new religion.
powerbox_create_new_language_description: Click a city where you want to create a new language, and the entire city will be overtaken by that new language.
powerbox_duplicate_language_description: Click a city where you want to create a duplicate language, and the entire city will be overtaken by a duplicate of its previous language with all traits carried over
powerbox_duplicate_religion_description: Click a city where you want to create a duplicate religion, and the entire city will be overtaken by a duplicate of its previous religion with all traits carried over
powerbox_create_new_subspecies_descripti: Click a unit that you want to make a new subspecies, and that unit will become its own subspecies.
powerbox_duplicate_subspecies_descriptio: Click a unit that you want to make a duplicate subspecies, and that unit will become a duplicate subspecies of its previous one.
powerbox_create_new_army_description: Click a unit that you want to make the leader of a new army, and that unit will create a new army.
